) poboard where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by bno desc

mapper.insert: insert into po_account( accNum, userId, accDiv, accCategory, accDate, accComment, accAmount) values ( po_accCategory_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{accDiv}, #{accCategory}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{accDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{accComment}, #{accAmount} )
mapper.select: select accNum, accDiv, accCategory, accDate, accComment, accAmount from po_account where userId = #{userId} order by accDate asc
